.chev:after{margin-top:50%;margin-left:50%;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transform:translate(-50%,-50%);color:#212F57;font-family:'Material Icons';content:"\e5cc";font-weight:400;font-size:1.5rem;display:inline-block;line-height:1;text-transform:none;letter-spacing:normal}#facebook{margin-bottom:3em}#twitter{margin-bottom:2em}@media (min-width:30em){.school-of-med{padding:1em 0}.school-of-med .links.right,.school-of-med .logo.left{width:48%}.school-of-med .logo{float:left}.school-of-med .links{float:right;padding-right:6%}.school-of-med img{padding-top:.5em;padding-left:10%;padding-right:4%}.school-of-med .blurb{margin-top:.5em;margin-bottom:0;padding-bottom:0;text-align:left}}@media (min-width:46.25em){.school-of-med img{padding-top:1em}}
